item.title: Running Meteor and Mongo in a Single Docker Container with Supervisord
item.author: kris.hamoud@gmail.com (Kris Hamoud)
item.description: The goal of this post is to show you how to run your meteor.js application with MongoDB in one Docker container. Note: This should only be done for testing or prototypes. Step 1: Get the example app This tutorial was written as of meteor 1.5.1 git clone https://github.com/meteor/todos mongo-meteor cd mongo-meteor meteor npm install meteor update Note: If you plan to run the application on localhost then you’ll have to remove the app-prod-security package
